titleStmt.title: The publican becomming a penitent: or The picture of a penitent sinner. Deliuered in two sermons in the cittie of London: anno 1625. / By Robert Lovell, minister of Gods word, and curate of Allhallowes-Barking within the same cittie..
titleStmt.author: Lovell, Robert, curate of Allhallows, Barking.
